import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import React, { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import gsap from "gsap"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import TestimonialSection from "../../components/TestimonialSection"; import PersonalPricingPlans from "../../components/ProffessionalPricingPlans"; import ProffessionalPricingPlans from "../../components/ProffessionalPricingPlans"; const ConstructionPage = () => { const tryRef = useRef(null); const scrollRef = useRef(null); const items = [ { img: "qr.png", label: "QR tagging" }, { img: "site.png", label: "Site/location mapping" }, { img: "inventory.png", label: "Centralized inventory" }, { img: "role.png", label: "Role-based access" }, { img: "ui.png", label: "Intuitive UI" }, { img: "account.png", label: "Team accountability" }, { img: "return.png", label: "Return/ transfer items" }, { img: "dash.png", label: "Usage analytics dashboard" }, { img: "business.png", label: "Efficient business" }, ]; // Auto-scrolling functionality useEffect(() => { const container = scrollRef.current; let scrollAmount = 0; let speed = 0.5; function autoScroll() { if (container) { scrollAmount += speed; container.scrollLeft = scrollAmount; if (scrollAmount >= container.scrollWidth / 2) { scrollAmount = 0; } } requestAnimationFrame(autoScroll); } autoScroll(); }, []); useEffect(() => { const el = tryRef.current; // Reset initial size (scales from parent %) gsap.set(el, { scale: 1 }); const tl = gsap.timeline({ repeat: -1, yoyo: true }); tl.to(el, { scale: 1.65, duration: 4, ease: "power1.inOut" }) .to(el, { scale: 1, duration: 4, ease: "power1.inOut" }); const onEnter = () => { tl.pause(); gsap.to(el, { scale: 1.6, duration: 0.8, ease: "power1.out" }); }; const onLeave = () => { gsap.to(el, { scale: 1, duration: 3, ease: "power1.inOut", onComplete: () => tl.resume(), }); }; el.addEventListener("mouseenter", onEnter); el.addEventListener("mouseleave", onLeave); return () => { el.removeEventListener("mouseenter", onEnter); el.removeEventListener("mouseleave", onLeave); }; }, []); return (
{/* Background Video */}

No delays. No guesswork. Just smarter decisions.

Track every material in real time. Act fast—give, move, use, flag, or restock the moment it’s needed—so your construction business grows with confident efficiency.

{/* Auto-scrolling Feature Cards */}
{[...items, ...items].map((item, index) => (

{/* CTA Button */}
Let's get started
{/* Right Section BG Image — position absolute and top-right aligned */}
{/* Left Section */}

STOQ in Action.

For Small Construction Businesses.

STOQ is the small Construction business inventory management app that serves as your real-time operations layer for physical resources. It maps tools, parts, and materials across jobs, teams, and sites — in one live, structured timeline.

STOQ fits any role. Use it solo or with teams and partners.

Stay in sync with your crew using built-in, item-focused messaging. Forget outdated spreadsheets and disconnected apps.

{/* Left Image — shifted upward and more centered beside text */}
{/* Right Section */}

Instant clarity from the first use. STOQ’s game-style interface makes using the app fun—no training required for You or Your Construction crew.

STOQ Works the way you work. Log materials in units your crew uses—kilos, packs, meters. One tap converts any cost to any currency.

Live Sync & Lasting History.
See updates the moment they happen—no delays, no duplicate work. STOQ quietly saves every change, from today’s tweaks to years-old records.

{/* CTA Button */}
See all plans
{/* call to action */}

Ready to run your Construction site like clockwork?

Start a free trial and track every tool, part, and load in one live dashboard.

); }; export default ConstructionPage;
